name: AudioFileRegion
desc: An audio file region specifies a segment of audio data.

items.name: init(mRegionID: UInt32, mName: Unmanaged<CFString>, mFlags: AudioFileRegionFlags, mNumberMarkers: UInt32, mMarkers: (AudioFileMarker))
var mFlags: AudioFileRegionFlags
items.desc: Audio File Services region flags. For details, see AudioFileRegionFlags.

items.name: var mMarkers: (AudioFileMarker)
items.desc: An array of mNumberMarkers elements describing where the data in the region starts. For details, see Audio File Marker Types.

items.name: var mNumberMarkers: UInt32
items.desc: The number of markers in the array specified in the mMarkers parameter.

items.name: var mRegionID: UInt32
items.desc: A unique ID associated with the audio file region.
